description:
This premium leather boot is built to withstand the rigors of daily use on the rocky trails of Yellowstone, a hard-wearing classic hiker fit for the rangers who oversee one of the world’s most stunning natural places. A plush but supportive dual-density midsole lends all-day comfort, while a sturdy upper and grippy Vibram outsole tame all manners of technical terrain.

Oboz Footwear Premium Collection is proud to support Yellowstone Forever to help ensure that Yellowstone National Park remains for generations to come.
name: Oboz Yellowstone Premium Mid B-Dry - Mens
